bios_settings.reason: macOS does not support Secure Boot.
Required for macOS power management. If you can't disable it, the 'AppleCpuPmCfgLock' quirk will be enabled automatically.
Disable unless you need it for other OSes and have configured `DisableIoMapper` quirk.
Required for modern GPUs and some hardware.

acpi_patches.name: SSDT-PLUG-COMETLAKE
acpi_patches.description: Sets CPU power management plugin-type for Comet Lake CPUs.

acpi_patches.name: SSDT-EC-USBX-DESKTOP
acpi_patches.description: Fixes embedded controller and USB power on desktop systems.

bios_settings.reason: macOS does not support Secure Boot.
Required for modern GPUs and Resizable BAR.
macOS does not support Resizable BAR. Disable it for compatibility.
